long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Better goSupermodel" was a browser extension, made by user Naddi, that introduces notifications about goCodes on goSupermodel.com. 

Support me on ko-fi:
https://ko-fi.com/naddi

v4.7:
- Profile creator to create the code for layouts
- Sticky header in the tradelog such that you can switch pages even if you're scrolled down to the bottom
- Make item images clickable so that you can open the itemlink in a new window
- "Challenge to Sketzmo" button in model dialog
- Preview functionality on forum posts so that you can see how a post will look with emojis etc.
- Blocked users: Introduce three stages so that you can individually for each blocked person select whether they're blurred, shown or hidden.
- Allow favorites of the old emojis so that you can hide them from the "quick-list" of emojis
- Club notifications for new applications or new posts in the forums
- Pin friends to the front page and community tab
- Show auction earnings in the better wardrobe
- Competition widget on the front page
- Live notifications

- Fix the search in the better wardrobe, so that you can now also search for recolours of items

-----

The list of features that this extension provides is:
- All links are clickable in forum topics, fmb, gomessages and goblogs.
- Images of wardrobe items when you hover links.
- Highlighting your own posts and topics in the forums in a custom colour (which can be changed, but not seen by others ofc).
- Show all images as "full" version (gifs are animated and pngs have transparency).
- Max height + scroll on very long posts, such that if someone posts the entire bee movie script, you'll still be able to navigate the forum topic.
- Preview topics by hovering over the title both in the forum overview and on the front page.
- Easily bookmark forum topics with the "bookmark" button, which will add it to the front page bookmark widget.
- "Hiding" a topic will blur it from the forum topic lists.
- Add the friend flower emoji next to your friends in forum topics.
- Bookmarks on the front page.
- Add a widget for the newest 18+ topics to the front page.
- Pin a club forum to the Community page.
- Group similar activities in the "Friend activities" widget on the front page.
- Add notes on items in the wardrobe.
- Sticky filters that stay on screen when you scroll.
- Icons in auctions for items from the shop and goCodes. This is supported by a community-maintained gocode overview.
- Hide the "Buy" button in the wishlist when visiting other people's wishlists â€“ this is to avoid accidentally buying items for yourself when you want to gift them.
- Highlighting duplicates by having an exclamation mark in the top left corner of the item in the wardrobe and in wishlists, which says how many you own.
- Showing how many items you're wearing.
- Live Sketzmo timer.
- Global Sketzmo timer above the Games button.
- Asking "Are you sure?" when you exit games.
- "Are you sure you want to leave?" when leaving a page, where you've written something in a text area.
- Published magazines", "Saved looks" and "Suggested looks" added to user profiles under "Collections".
- Fix the styling on the magazine editor such that it fits the new text tool.
- Favouriting the new emojis so they show up next to the old emojis.
- Emoji picker in the friend message board.
- Notes for users in your contact list and blocklist. These are shown in the lists, but also on the user popups
- Custom censoring of words.
- Popup windows are now movable on site
- Forum preview also shows who made the topic
- It is now possible to turn off the blurring for selected blocked people.
- New notification popup
- Brand new wardrobe with a bunch of features such as: collections, information, filtering by favourites and duplicates, multi-auction, multi-trade, saving combos.
- Info-button on items in the wardrobe with links to goSuper.tools and the gSm database.
- Checkmarks after item links if you own the item.
- Click usernames to copy them (in model pop up)
- Cilck gocodes to copy them (in notification window)
- Auction button in model pop up now actually leads to auctions instead of wardrobe
- New category system in the wardrobe, with the option to move items and import categories from goSuper.tools.
- Auction timer
- Completely hide blocked users
- Tutorials for the extension
- Accept/decline all in the trade log
- Better styling of the trade pop up
- Send trades directly from people's wishlist
- New "Better picture gallery" with collections
- Custom ordering in the better wardrobe
- Restyling of the info panel in the better wardrobe which includes goSuper.tools tags
- Sketzmo typing is removed, as it is now supported without the browser
- Ideas overview
- Import/export feature for settings
- Colours for visited forum topics (optional)
- Add "See on goSuper.tools" in lost auction messages
- Auction again in not sold auction messages
- Hide club icon in forum widget (optional)
- "Cancel all trades" button in trade log
- Search functionality in better picture gallery
- Search functionality when inserting pictures in fmb, goblog, forum
- Character and word count when writing a forum post (optional)
- Wishlist: Show how many of the item you own
- Show size of better wardrobe collections
- "Worn items" filter in the better wardrobe "Other" filter
- Reset to current outfit in better wardrobe
- "Are you sure?" prompt when resetting outfit or removing all on outfit (optional)
- Reload button in better wardrobe that fetches anything new that you've bought
- Multi-remove in better wardrobe collections
- Submit trades to goSuper.tools! From the tradelog, you can submit trades to let the goSuper.tools website know what items are worth
- Wishlist icons beside item links
- Blur full posts that mention a censored word
- Select width of wardrobe
- Hide magazines that you do not want to see.
- Assign categories to collections, so they only appear under that specific category
- Sort by newest, oldest, your custom ordering and random
- New categories: shoes>accessories, sleeves, weapons, umbrellas, renamed animals to creatures
- New colours: gold and silver
- Search for links
- "Not in a collection" filter under "Other"
- Icon for items that are not tradable/auctionable in multi-select mode
- Ctrl+z in Sketzmo to undo.
- When opening item-links, there's now a link to goSuper.tools
- Item preview on goSuper.tools links
- Scroll to top button in forums
- Disable tutorial popup in magazines
- Better styling on the currency exchange
- Add user notes from the friends list
- Submit auctions prices to goSuper.tools


BETA:
- Searching by designer in the wardrobe (not fully functional)
- Wardrobe favourites (not fully functional).
- Filter by "Out of stock" items in wishlist (not fully functional).
